section.section:
An applicant for a dealer's license shall:
submit to the Secretary an application on the form that the Secretary provides; and
pay to the Secretary an application fee of $50, payable to the Comptroller.
A refund or proration of the application fee is prohibited.

text.section: Each application for a dealer's license shall contain the following statement: "Any false information supplied or statement made in this application is a crime which may be punished by imprisonment for a period of not more than 3 years, or a fine of not more than $5,000 or both.".
If an applicant is a corporation, a corporate officer who is a resident of the State shall complete and execute the application.
